product_name: HeadsUp Systems Wireless Gear Alert System
long_description: Keep your gear from getting crunched. The HeadsUp Systems Wireless Gear Alert is an electronic alarm that audibly and visibly alerts you to stop the car BEFORE driving into the garage! Garage-mounted LED sign detects bikes, kayaks, roof-top cargo carriers-anything with a wireless gear tag-and lights up reminding you to stop. In addition, in-car alerter sounds a tone inside vehicle that reminds you to stop. Wireless system includes LED alert sign to mount inside garage,1 in-car alerter that sits inside your vehicle, and 2 water-resistant wireless tags that attach to your gear. LED sign plugs into wall socket with 12V power adapter; alerter and gear tags include replaceable batteries (system alerts you when a battery needs to be replaced). Sensing range is approximately 50 - 100 ft. (15 - 30m).
short_description: Keep your gear from getting crunched. The HeadsUp Systems Wireless Gear Alert is an electronic alarm that audibly and visibly alerts you to stop the car BEFORE driving into the garage!
